name:
WAKU WAKU SWEETS:
Happy Sweets Making
description:
Let's make lots of sweets at the yearning sweets shop!

With easy operation, you can make sweets happily!

You can learn how to make sweets with over 100 kinds of fun while playing!

There are many recipes including cakes, cookies, Japanese sweets and so on.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
